attributes.action: Stop large corporates like Tesco from entering into direct competition with small businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companies like Tesco do have a useful role   in the economy to help control inflation but the government has allowed Tesco to be in direct competition with small businesses and therefore have a financial advantage and muscle to put the small businesses out of bussiness. Now they have entered the property market, what next?
